**farmhouse prairie ear warmer – crochet pattern**

the farmhouse prairie ear warmer is a super cosy, quick-to-make accessory that’s perfect for chilly days. worked in soft bulky yarn, this design gives you that classic rustic look with a modern, squishy texture. it’s an easy, relaxing project that works up fast, making it great for gifts, market prep, or last-minute makes for yourself.
